database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS Theonella swinhoei standards
entry.description: purified standards of onnamide A, onnamide B and cyclotheonamide isolated from Theonella swinhoei (yellow chemotype, Hachijo Jima, Japan). Reference: Wilson MC, Mori T, R�ckert C, Uria AR, Helf MJ, Takada K, Gernert C, Steffens UA, Heycke N, Schmitt S, Rinke C, Helfrich EJ, Brachmann AO, Gurgui C, Wakimoto T, Kracht M, Cr�semann M, Hentschel U, Abe I, Matsunaga S, Kalinowski J, Takeyama H, Piel J. An environmental bacterial taxon with a large and distinct metabolic repertoire. Nature. 2014 Feb 6;506(7486):58-62.
